metadata.title: CVE-2017-0373 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The gen_class_pod implementation in lib/Config/Model/Utils/GenClassPod.pm in Config-Model (aka libconfig-model-perl) before 2.102 has a dangerous "use lib" line, which allows remote attackers to have an unspecified impact via a crafted Debian package file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-0373` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libconfig-model-perl - 2.097-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libconfig-model-perl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.097-2').
